claim_text: This passage is from Amazon.com, Inc.’s Form 10-K, specifically Item 1. Business.
source_quote: This passage is from Amazon.com, Inc.’s Form 10-K, specifically Item 1. Business.

claim_text: The annual report contains forward-looking statements based on expectations, estimates, and projections as of the date of the filing.
source_quote: This Annual Report on Form 10-K and the documents incorporated herein by reference contain forward-looking statements based on expectations, estimates, and projections as of the date of this filing.

claim_text: Actual results and outcomes may differ materially from those expressed in forward-looking statements.
source_quote: Actual results and outcomes may differ materially from those expressed in forward-looking statements.

claim_text: The terms "Amazon.com," "we," and "our" are defined within the context of the annual report.
source_quote: It defines the use of terms like “Amazon.com,” “we,” and “our” within the context of the annual report

claim_text: “Amazon.com,” “we,” and “our” include Amazon.com, Inc. and its subsidiaries unless the context indicates otherwise.
source_quote: “herein, "Amazon.com," "we," "our," and similar terms include Amazon.com, Inc. and its subsidiaries, unless the context indicates otherwise.”

claim_text: The company seeks to be Earth’s most customer-centric company.
source_quote: General We seek to be Earth's most customer-centric company.

claim_text: The company is guided by four principles: customer obsession, passion for invention, commitment to operational excellence, and long-term thinking.
source_quote: We are guided by four principles: customer obsession rather than competitor focus, passion for invention, commitment to operational excellence, and long-term thinking.

claim_text: The company serves its primary customer sets consisting of consumers and sellers.
source_quote: In each of our segments, we serve our primary customer sets, consisting of consumers, sellers,

claim_text: The Company organizes its operations into three segments: North America, International, and Amazon Web Services ("AWS")
source_quote: These segments reflect the way the Company evaluates its business performance and manages its operations.

claim_text: The Company serves primary customer sets including consumers, sellers, developers, enterprises, content creators, advertisers, and employees.
source_quote: thinking. In each of our segments, we serve our primary customer sets, consisting of consumers, sellers, developers, enterprises, content creators, advertisers, and employees.

claim_text: Information on the Company’s net sales is located in Item 8 of Part II, "Financial Statements and Supplementary Data - Note"
source_quote: Information on our net sales is contained in Item 8 of Part II, "Financial Statements and Supplementary Data - Note"

claim_text: Amazon’s net sales are located in Item 8 of Part II, "Financial Statements and Supplementary Data - Note 10 - Segment Information."
source_quote: our net sales is contained in Item 8 of Part II, "Financial Statements and Supplementary Data - Note 10 - Segment Information."

claim_text: Amazon serves consumers through its online and physical stores.
source_quote: Consumers We serve consumers through our online and physical stores

claim_text: Amazon’s stores enable the sale of hundreds of millions of unique products by Amazon and third parties.
source_quote: We design our stores to enable hundreds of millions of unique products to be sold by us and by third parties across dozens of product categories.

claim_text: Customers can access Amazon’s offerings through websites, mobile apps, Alexa, devices, streaming, and physical stores.
source_quote: Customers access our offerings through our websites, mobile apps, Alexa, devices, streaming, and physically visiting our stores.

claim_text: Amazon offers its customers products and services through websites, mobile apps, Alexa, devices, streaming, and physically visiting its stores.
source_quote: websites, mobile apps, Alexa, devices, streaming, and physically visiting our stores.

claim_text: Amazon manufactures and sells electronic devices, including Kindle, Fire tablet, Fire TV, Echo, Ring, Blink, and eero.
source_quote: We also manufacture and sell electronic devices, including Kindle, Fire tablet, Fire TV, Echo, Ring, Blink, and eero

claim_text: Amazon offers subscription services such as Amazon Prime, which includes fast, free shipping.
source_quote: In addition, we offer subscription services such as Amazon Prime, a membership program that includes fast, free shipping on

claim_text: Amazon offers subscription services, including Amazon Prime.
source_quote: addition, we offer subscription services such as Amazon Prime

claim_text: Amazon Prime includes fast, free shipping on tens of millions of items.
source_quote: a membership program that includes fast, free shipping on tens of millions of items

claim_text: Amazon fulfills customer orders through North America and International fulfillment networks.
source_quote: We fulfill customer orders in a number of ways, including through: North America and International fulfillment networks that we operate

claim_text: Amazon utilizes co-sourced and outsourced arrangements in certain countries for fulfillment.
source_quote: We fulfill customer orders in a number of ways, including through: co-sourced and outsourced arrangements in certain countries

claim_text: Amazon provides digital delivery of products and services.
source_quote: We fulfill customer orders in a number of ways, including through: digital delivery

claim_text: Amazon operates customer service centers globally.
source_quote: We operate customer service centers globally

claim_text: Amazon operates customer service centers globally.
source_quote: We operate customer service centers globally

claim_text: Amazon earns fees from its seller programs.
source_quote: We earn fixed fees, a percentage of sales, per-unit activity fees, interest, or some combination thereof, for our seller programs.

claim_text: Amazon is not the seller of record in its seller programs.
source_quote: We are not the seller of record in these transactions.

claim_text: Amazon offers programs for developers and enterprises of all sizes.
source_quote: We serve developers and enterprises of all sizes, including start-ups, government agencies, and academic institutions

claim_text: AWS provides a broad set of on-demand technology services.
source_quote: through AWS, which offers a broad set of on-demand technology services, including compute, storage, database, analytics, and machine learning

claim_text: The company’s Form 10-K includes information about segment information in Item 8 of Part II.
source_quote: It details the company’s operational approach, outlining its three operating segments – North America, International, and Amazon Web Services (“AWS”), and references the location of financial information within the document, namely Item 8 of Part II, “Financial Statements and Supplementary Data - Note 10 - Segment Information.”

claim_text: Amazon provides advertising services to sellers, publishers, authors, and others.
source_quote: We provide advertising services to sellers, vendors, publishers, authors, and others, through programs such as sponsored ads, display, and video advertising.

claim_text: Amazon’s business encompasses a large variety of product types, service offerings, and delivery channels.
source_quote: Our businesses encompass a large variety of product types, service offerings, and delivery channels.

claim_text: The worldwide marketplace in which Amazon competes is evolving rapidly and intensely competitive.
source_quote: The worldwide marketplace in which we compete is evolving rapidly and intensely competitive

claim_text: The worldwide marketplace is evolving rapidly and intensely competitive.
source_quote: The worldwide marketplace in which we compete is evolving rapidly and intensely competitive

claim_text: Amazon faces competitors from various industry sectors, including physical, e-commerce, and omnichannel retailers.
source_quote: Our current and potential competitors include: (1) physical, e-commerce, and omnichannel retailers

claim_text: Amazon’s competitors include publishers, producers, and distributors of physical, digital, and interactive media.
source_quote: Our current and potential competitors include: (2) publishers, producers, and distributors of physical, digital, and interactive media of all types and all distribution

claim_text: Web search engines, comparison shopping websites, and social networks are identified as channels for discovering and acquiring goods and services.
source_quote: web search engines, comparison shopping websites, social networks

claim_text: Companies providing e-commerce services include website development and hosting.
source_quote: companies that provide e-commerce services, including website development and hosting

claim_text: Omnichannel sales are a service provided by companies that offer e-commerce services.
source_quote: omnichannel sales

claim_text: Amazon.com, Inc. faces competition from companies that provide fulfillment and logistics services.
source_quote: companies that provide fulfillment and logistics services for themselves or for third parties, whether online or offline;

claim_text: Amazon.com, Inc. faces competition from companies that provide information technology services.
source_quote: companies that provide information technology services or products, including on-premises or cloud-based infrastructure and other services;

claim_text: Amazon.com, Inc. faces competition from companies that design, manufacture, market, or sell consumer electronics.
source_quote: companies that design, manufacture, market, or sell consumer electronics, telecommunication, and electronic devices;

claim_text: Amazon’s retail businesses prioritize selection, price, and convenience, including fast and reliable fulfillment.
source_quote: We believe that the principal competitive factors in our retail businesses include selection, price, and convenience, including fast and reliable fulfillment.

claim_text: Amazon’s seller and enterprise services depend on the quality, speed, and reliability of their services and tools.
source_quote: Additional competitive factors for our seller and enterprise services include the quality, speed, and reliability of our services and tools, as well as

claim_text: Some of our current and potential competitors have greater resources.
source_quote: Some of our current and potential competitors have greater resources

claim_text: Competitors may secure better terms from suppliers.
source_quote: They may secure better terms from suppliers

claim_text: Competitors may adopt more aggressive pricing.
source_quote: They may secure better terms from suppliers, adopt more aggressive pricing

claim_text: Competitors may pursue restrictive distribution agreements.
source_quote: They may secure better terms from suppliers, adopt more aggressive pricing, pursue restrictive distribution agreements that restrict our access to supply

claim_text: Amazon faces competition that may attempt to restrict its access to supply.
source_quote: restrict our access to supply

claim_text: Amazon’s competitors may direct consumers to their own offerings instead of Amazon’s.
source_quote: direct consumers to their own offerings instead of ours

claim_text: Amazon’s competitors may lock in potential customers with restrictive terms.
source_quote: lock-in potential customers with restrictive terms

claim_text: Amazon must devote more resources to technology, infrastructure, fulfillment, and marketing.
source_quote: devote more resources to technology, infrastructure, fulfillment, and marketing

claim_text: The internet facilitates competitive entry and comparison shopping.
source_quote: internet facilitates competitive entry and comparison shopping

claim_text: New, smaller, or lesser-known businesses can compete against Amazon.
source_quote: which enhances the ability of new, smaller, or lesser-known businesses to compete against us
